title: Spring Basketball Tournament
description: Annual inter-dorm basketball tournament on the Dartmouth Green. Open to all skill levels. Sign up as a team or individual!

title: Jazz Night at Collis
description: Live jazz performance featuring the Dartmouth Jazz Ensemble. Free admission, refreshments provided.

title: AI & Ethics Lecture Series
description: Distinguished speaker series on artificial intelligence and its ethical implications. This week: Prof. Sarah Chen on algorithmic bias.

title: Winter Carnival Social
description: Annual Dartmouth Winter Carnival social event. Live music, food trucks, and ice sculptures on the Green.

title: Intro to Machine Learning Workshop
description: Hands-on workshop covering ML fundamentals using Python. Bring your laptop! No prior experience needed.

title: Outdoor Film Screening: Interstellar
description: Outdoor movie night on the Green. Blankets and popcorn provided. Starts at sunset.
